thread.title: SORRY snowflake: Kennedy nukes climate change troll AND Leonardo DiCaprio in ONE tweet
thread.title_full: SORRY snowflake: Kennedy nukes climate change troll AND Leonardo DiCaprio in ONE tweet

author: Sam J.
title: SORRY snowflake: Kennedy nukes climate change troll AND Leonardo DiCaprio in ONE tweet
text:
SORRY snowflake: Kennedy nukes climate change troll AND Leonardo DiCaprio in ONE tweet Posted at 12:57 pm on February 23, 2017 by Sam J. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
When will trolls learn if you don’t start none won’t be none? 
Apparently this tidbit about distractions from Kennedy on Fox News this morning upset a few climate change peeps ( let’s be honest, what DOESN’T upset these people? ): . @KennedyNation : "These social issues are a big distraction for the right the way that climate change is for the left." #Outnumbered pic.twitter.com/iEUSXPivD3 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) February 23, 2017 
Climate change is a distraction for the Left. Fair point. Or at least they attempt to use it as a distraction when debating any and everything on the planet (heh, we said planet). Trending
